ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ لَن نَّبْرَحَ عَلَيْهِ عَٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرْجِعَ إِلَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We will not stop devoting ourselves to it until Musa returns to us.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said "So long as Moses does not come back we are not going to give it up, and we will remain devoted to it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But they answered: "By no means shall we cease to worship it until Moses returns to us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "We shall continue worshipping the calf until Moses comes back."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We will continue to squat* before it, till Moosa returns to us.” (* Continue worshipping it.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We will not stop worshipping it, until Musa returns to us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We will by no means cease to keep to its worship until Musa returns to us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We will not cease,' they said, 'to cleave to it, until Moses returns to us.')
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We shall by no means cease to be its votaries till Moses return unto us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "We shall not cease to worship it until Moses returns to us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we shall by no means cease to be assiduous to it until there returneth to us Musa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They had said, ‘We will keep on clinging to it until Moses returns to us.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They had said: "We will not abandon this cult, but we will devote ourselves to it until Moses returns to us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We will not stop worshipping it (i.e. the calf), until Musa (Moses) returns to us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We will not stop; we will cling to it until Moses returns to us.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We will not give up our devotion to it, until Moses returns to us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:91] They said, ‘We will not cease to cling to it, persisting in worship of it, until Moses returns to us’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We shall by no means cease to be its votaries) we will continue to worship it (till Moses return unto us).
